QueryTitle: Is my privacy at risk with this device?
BoycottingReasonDetails: I'm worried about how my voice data is being stored and used. Does anyone else feel the privacy isn't up to par?

QueryTitle: What's the environmental impact of this phone?
BoycottingReasonDetails: I read about the negative environmental effects of mining for materials in these phones. It's making me rethink my choices.

QueryTitle: Why can't I repair my own MacBook?
BoycottingReasonDetails: It's nearly impossible to make simple repairs on this laptop. Anyone else frustrated with the anti-repair policies?

QueryTitle: Are connectivity issues prevalent with Pixel Buds A-Series?
BoycottingReasonDetails: Several users have expressed frustration over persistent connectivity issues with the Pixel Buds A-Series. These problems include frequent disconnections and poor signal stability, even when the connected device is nearby

QueryTitle: Why is the PlayStation 5 so hard to find?
BoycottingReasonDetails: Many users have reported that their PlayStation 5 units overheat during extended gaming sessions, which can lead to sudden shutdowns or reduced performance.

QueryTitle: How durable are the AirPods Pro?
BoycottingReasonDetails: Many users report that the AirPods Pro fail after minimal use. Are these earbuds built to last or are they too fragile?
